Title: Pitruroon
Writer: Nitish Bharadwaj, Nitish Bharadwaj, Pravin Vithal Tarde, Pravin Vithal Tarde
Actors: Poorvi Bhave, Suhas Joshi, Sachin Khedekar, Omkar Kulkarni
Plot: In today's urban Indian lifestyle where more relationships seem idealistic and flawless, an archaeologist encounters his look alike and the disturbing past of the look alike's aging mother ...
